meta.description: Minimize the cost of transferring medical supplies between hospitals to meet their needs during a health crisis.

sets.name: HOSPITALS
sets.description: Set of hospitals involved in the supply distribution.

params.name: initial_supplies
params.description: Initial supplies available at each hospital.

params.name: transfer_cost
params.description: Cost of transferring supplies from one hospital to another.

vars.name: transfer
vars.description: Amount of supplies transferred from one hospital to another.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(transfer['1']['2'] * transfer_cost['1']['2'] + transfer['1']['3'] * transfer_cost['1']['3'] + transfer['1']['4'] * transfer_cost['1']['4'] + transfer['2']['1'] * transfer_cost['2']['1'] + transfer['2']['3'] * transfer_cost['2']['3'] + transfer['2']['4'] * transfer_cost['2']['4'] + transfer['3']['1'] * transfer_cost['3']['1'] + transfer['3']['2'] * transfer_cost['3']['2'] + transfer['3']['4'] * transfer_cost['3']['4'] + transfer['4']['1'] * transfer_cost['4']['1'] + transfer['4']['2'] * transfer_cost['4']['2'] + transfer['4']['3'] * transfer_cost['4']['3'])
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of transferring supplies between hospitals.

constraints.name: supply_balance_1
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['1'] - needed_supplies['1'] + transfer['2']['1'] + transfer['3']['1'] + transfer['4']['1'] - transfer['1']['2'] - transfer['1']['3'] - transfer['1']['4']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 1 has exactly the supplies it needs after transfers.

constraints.name: supply_balance_2
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['2'] - needed_supplies['2'] + transfer['1']['2'] + transfer['3']['2'] + transfer['4']['2'] - transfer['2']['1'] - transfer['2']['3'] - transfer['2']['4']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 2 has exactly the supplies it needs after transfers.

constraints.name: supply_balance_3
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['3'] - needed_supplies['3'] + transfer['1']['3'] + transfer['2']['3'] + transfer['4']['3'] - transfer['3']['1'] - transfer['3']['2'] - transfer['3']['4']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 3 has exactly the supplies it needs after transfers.

constraints.name: supply_balance_4
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['4'] - needed_supplies['4'] + transfer['1']['4'] + transfer['2']['4'] + transfer['3']['4'] - transfer['4']['1'] - transfer['4']['2'] - transfer['4']['3']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 4 has exactly the supplies it needs after transfers.
